00039 
00040 Entree& Decouper_Bord_coincident::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00041 {
00042   if(dimension==3)
00043     {
00044       Cerr << "We do not know how to split in 3D" << finl;
00045       exit();
00046     }
00047   associer_domaine(is);
00048   is >> nom_bord;
00049 
00050   for(int i=0; i<domaine().nb_zones() ; i++)
00051 
00052     {
00053       Decouper_Bord_coincident_(domaine().zone(i));
00054     }
00055   Cerr << "Decouper_Bord_coincident... OK" << finl;
00056   return is;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void Decouper_Bord_coincident::Decouper_Bord_coincident_(Zone& zone)
00061 {
00062   if  (zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Triangle")
00063 // ||(zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Tetraedre"))
00064     {
00065       Nom fichier="connectivity_failed_";
00066       fichier+=nom_bord;
00067       EFichier fic(fichier);
00068 
00069       if(!fic.good())
00070         {
00071           Cerr << "The file " << fichier << " was not found !!! " << finl;
00072           exit();
00073         }
00074 
00075       Domaine& dom = zone.domaine();
00076       const DoubleTab& xs = dom.coord_sommets();
00077       IntTab& les_elems = zone.les_elems();
00078       int oldsz = les_elems.dimension(0);
00079       int oldnbsom = zone.nb_som();
00080 
00081       IntTab new_elems(3*oldsz, dimension+1); //!< tableau sur-dimensionne
00082 
00083 // Construction de l'Octree sur la grille VEF de base
00084       zone.construit_octree();
00085 
00086 // On dimensionne une premiere fois le tableau des sommets
00087 // puis on redimensionnera seulement a la fin par la dimension exacte
00088       Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(dom);
00089 
00090       DoubleTab& sommets_dom = dom.les_sommets();
00091 // int dim_som_old=sommets_dom.dimension(0); // dim_som_old = oldnbsom
00092       sommets_dom.resize(2*oldnbsom,dimension);
00093 
00094 // On initialise new_elem sur la base du maillage non redecoupe :
00095 
00096       for(int elem=0; elem<oldsz; elem++)
00097         {
00098           for(int k=0; k<dimension+1; k++)
00099             new_elems(elem, k) = les_elems(elem,k);
00100           mettre_a_jour_sous_zone(zone,elem,oldsz,0);
00101         }
00102 
00103 
00104       int face_oldsz, face_newsz, fac, indice;
00105 
00106       fic >> face_oldsz;
00107       fic >> face_newsz;
00108 
00109       IntTab new_faces_racc(face_newsz, dimension);
00110 // IntTab new_faces_int(3*face_oldsz, dimension); // tableau sur-dimensionne
00111 
00112       int j,elem;
00113       int j0=0,j1=0,j2=0;
00114       int som1=0,som2=0;
00115 
00116 
00117 // compteurs
00118 
00119       int indice_new_som = oldnbsom;
00120       int i=0;
00121 // int ii=0;
00122 
00123       fic >> indice ;
00124 
00125       while (indice!=-1)
00126         {
00127           if (!fic.good())
00128             {
00129               Cerr<<"Pb with "<<fichier <<" in Decouper_Bord_coincident::interpreter_"<<finl;
00130               Cerr<<" eof ???"<<finl;
00131               exit();
00132             }
00133 
00134           fic >> fac >> elem >> j ;
00135 
00136           if(j==0)
00137             {
00138               j0=0;
00139               j1=1;
00140               j2=2;
00141             }
00142           else if(j==1)
00143             {
00144               j0=1;
00145               j1=0;
00146               j2=2;
00147             }
00148           else if(j==2)
00149             {
00150               j0=2;
00151               j1=0;
00152               j2=1;
00153             }
00154           else
00155             {
00156               Cerr << " problem with the index j " << finl;
00157               exit();
00158             }
00159 
00160           if(indice==1) //!< face de bord a ne pas decouper
00161             {
00162               new_faces_racc(fac,0) = les_elems(elem,j1);
00163               new_faces_racc(fac,1) = les_elems(elem,j2);
00164             }
00165           else if(indice==2) //!< face de bord a decouper
00166             {
00167               som1=les_elems(elem,j1);
00168               som2=les_elems(elem,j2);
00169 
00170               sommets_dom(indice_new_som,0) = 0.5*(xs(som1,0)+xs(som2,0));
00171               sommets_dom(indice_new_som,1) = 0.5*(xs(som1,1)+xs(som2,1));
00172 
00173 //
00174 
00175               new_elems(elem, 0) = les_elems(elem,j0);
00176               new_elems(elem, 1) = les_elems(elem,j1);
00177               new_elems(elem, 2) = indice_new_som;
00178 
00179               new_faces_racc(fac,0) = les_elems(elem,j1);
00180               new_faces_racc(fac,1) = indice_new_som;
00181 
00182 //
00183 
00184               new_elems(i+oldsz, 0) = les_elems(elem,j0);
00185               new_elems(i+oldsz, 1) = les_elems(elem,j2);
00186               new_elems(i+oldsz, 2) = indice_new_som;
00187 
00188               new_faces_racc(i+face_oldsz,0) = les_elems(elem,2);
00189               new_faces_racc(i+face_oldsz,1) = indice_new_som;
00190 
00191               indice_new_som++;
00192               i++;
00193 
00194 //
00195 
00196 // new_faces_int(ii,0) = les_elems(elem,j0);
00197 // new_faces_int(ii,1) = indice_new_som;
00198 // 
00199 // ii++;
00200             }
00201           else
00202             {
00203               Cerr << "problem with the partition of the element to realize" << finl;
00204               Cerr << "We do not know how to split in " << indice << finl;
00205               exit();
00206             }
00207 
00208           fic >> indice ;
00209 
00210         }//while
00211 
00212 
00213       Cerr << " Number of boundary face (generated) " << i+face_oldsz << finl;
00214       Cerr << " Number of boundary face (planned)  " << face_newsz << finl;
00215 
00216       if( (i+face_oldsz) != face_newsz)
00217         {
00218           Cerr << " Concern in the reconstruction " << finl;
00219           exit();
00220         }
00221 
00222 
00223       sommets_dom.resize(indice_new_som,dimension);
00224       new_elems.resize(i+oldsz,dimension+1);
00225       les_elems.ref(new_elems);
00226 // new_faces_int.resize(ii,dimension);
00227 
00228 // Reconstruction de l'octree
00229       Cerr << "Splitting performs ..." << finl;
00230       zone.invalide_octree();
00231       if(dimension==2)
00232         zone.typer("Triangle");
00233       else
00234         zone.typer("Tetraedre");
00235       Cerr << "  Reconstruction of the Octree" << finl;
00236       zone.construit_octree();
00237       Cerr << "  Octree rebuilt" << finl;
00238 
00239       {
00240 // Les Raccords
00241         Cerr << "Splitting of connections" << finl;
00242         LIST_CURSEUR(Raccord) curseur(zone.faces_raccord());;;
00243         while(curseur)
00244           {
00245             if(curseur.valeur()->le_nom()==nom_bord)
00246               {
00247                 Faces& les_faces=curseur.valeur()->faces();
00248                 if(dimension==2)
00249                   les_faces.typer(Faces::segment_2D);
00250                 else
00251                   les_faces.typer(Faces::triangle_3D);
00252 
00253                 IntTab& sommets=les_faces.les_sommets();
00254                 assert(sommets.dimension(1)==dimension);
00255                 sommets.ref(new_faces_racc);
00256                 les_faces.voisins().resize(face_newsz, 2);
00257                 les_faces.voisins()=-1;
00258               }
00259             ++curseur;
00260           }
00261       }
00262       Scatter::init_sequential_domain(dom);
00263       /*
00264         {
00265         // Les Faces internes
00266         Cerr << "Splitting of internal faces" << finl;
00267         LIST_CURSEUR(Faces_Interne) curseur(zone.faces_int());;;
00268         while(curseur)
00269         {
00270         Faces& les_faces=curseur->faces();
00271         if(dimension==2)
00272         les_faces.typer(Faces::segment_2D);
00273         else
00274         les_faces.typer(Faces::triangle_3D);
00275 
00276         IntTab& sommets=les_faces.les_sommets();
00277         int nb_faces=sommets.dimension(0);
00278         assert(sommets.dimension(1)==dimension);
00279 
00280         IntTab new_faces(nb_faces+ii, dimension);
00281 
00282         for(int j=0; j<nb_faces; j++)
00283         for(int k=0; k<dimension; k++)
00284         new_faces(j,k)=sommets(j,k);
00285 
00286         for(int j=0; j<ii; j++)
00287         for(int k=0; k<dimension; k++)
00288         new_faces(j+nb_faces,k)=new_faces_int(j,k);
00289 
00290         sommets.ref(new_faces);
00291         les_faces.voisins().resize(nb_faces+ii, 2);
00292         les_faces.voisins()=-1;
00293         }
00294         }
00295       */
00296       Cerr<<"END of Decouper_Bord_coincident..."<<finl;
00297       Cerr<<"  1 NbElem="<<zone.les_elems().dimension(0)<<"  NbSom="<<zone.nb_som()<<finl;
00298     }
00299   else
00300     {
00301       Cerr << "We do not yet know how to Decouper_Bord_coincident the "
00302            << zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() <<"s"<<finl;
00303     }
00304 
00305 }
